sentence.Network_en: The jury listened to his impassioned explication of article 306.
sentence.Network_cn: 陪审团听取了他对第306条充满激情的阐述。
他充满激情的请求未被理睬。

sentence.Network_en: She made an impassioned plea for help.

entry.tran: 充满激情的;激昂的;激烈的
entry.def: An impassioned speech or piece of writing is one in which someone expresses their strong feelings about an issue in a forceful way.

example.ex: He made an impassioned appeal for peace.

auth_sentence.content: He gave an impassioned speech, garnering applause throughout.
auth_sentence.res_content: He gave an impassioned speech, garnering applause throughout.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He gave an impassioned speech, garnering applause throughout.

auth_sentence.content: A...general meditation...which rises gradually to an impassioned peroration.
auth_sentence.res_content: A...general meditation...which rises gradually to an impassioned peroration.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A...general meditation...which rises gradually to an impassioned peroration.

auth_sentence.content: An ardent naturalist and an impassioned bird's egg collector.
auth_sentence.res_content: An ardent naturalist and an impassioned bird's egg collector.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: An ardent naturalist and an impassioned bird's egg collector.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =pass through,表示"步,通过"; 2. =feeling,表示"感情"; 3. = 表示"忍耐,遭受"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不能通行的,无路可通的
stems_affixes.word_buile: impasse[n.僵局,死路]+able能……的→adj.不能通行的,无路可通的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 慷慨激昂的,充满激情的
stems_affixes.word_buile: im进入+passion激情+ed有……的→有激情的
im无+pass感情+ive……的→没感情
pass感情+ive……的→感情用事→被动的
com共同+pass步,通过→共同能过的地方→做事的范围
im不+pass步,通过+e→通不过
pass步,通过→v.经过；通过；度过；传递 n.通行证；经过

stems_affixes.value_cn: 通过,经过;通路,走廊;[一]段落,[一]节
stems_affixes.word_buile: pass步,通过+age总称→n.通过,经过;通路,走廊;[一]段落,[一]节
pass步,通过+enger人→通过的人→乘客

stems_affixes.value_cn: 护照,达到某种目的的手段
stems_affixes.word_buile: pass步,通过+port港口→通过港口的凭证
com共同+passion感情→有共同的感情→同情

stems_affixes.value_cn: 热情,激情,爱好;激怒;强烈感情
stems_affixes.word_buile: pass感情+ion表名词→n.热情,激情,爱好;激怒;强烈感情
tres=trans越过+pass步,通过→横穿而过
en进入+compass范围→包围
pass步,通过→v.经过；通过；度过；传递 n.通行证；经过

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"向内,成为,进入,使……"; 2. 表示"不,无,非"

stems_affixes.word_buile: im向内,成为,进入,使……+passion激情+ed……的→adj.慷慨激昂的
im向内,成为,进入,使……+plic重叠+it→进入重叠→不直说→储蓄的
im不,无,非+moral道德的→adj.不道德的
im不,无,非+mortal死的→adj.不朽的
im不,无,非+mutable可变的→adj.不变的
im不,无,非+partial有偏见的→adj.公平的
im不,无,非+pass感情+ive……的→没感情
im不,无,非+pecc斑点+able……的→无斑点的
im不,无,非+polite礼貌的→adj.无礼的
im不,无,非+possible可能的→adj.不可能的
im向内,成为,进入,使……+migrate移居→入住
im向内,成为,进入,使……+pel推→推进,驱动
im向内,成为,进入,使……+peril危险→v.使处于危险中
im向内,成为,进入,使……+person人+ate表动词→进入别人→扮演别人
im向内,成为,进入,使……+prison监狱→v.监禁
im向内,成为,进入,使……+pulse跳动→内在推动→冲动

means.word_mean: 充满激情的, 热烈的

sentences.en: The director of the charity made an impassioned plea for help.
sentences.cn: 慈善机构的负责人强烈请求帮助。

sentences.en: She wrote an impassioned letter to her local newspaper to complain about the new road.
sentences.cn: 她给当地的报纸写了一封措辞激烈的信，抱怨新修的马路。

sentences.en: After three hours of impassioned debate the motion was defeated.
sentences.cn: 经过三小时激烈的辩论, 这项动议被否决了。
